text: Ni:Sanka musalamana purusa ane stri'o, imanavala purusa ane stri'o, ajnanum palana karanara purusa ane stri'o, satya vata karanara purusa ane stri'o, dhiraja rakhanara purusa ane stri'o, ajiji karanara purusa ane stri'o, dana karanara purusa ane stri'o, rojho rakhanara purusa ane stri'o, potana guptangani suraksa karanara purusa ane stri'o ane allahana namanum vadhare smarana karanara purusa ane stri'o, a (badha) mate allaha ta'ala'e maphi ane khuba ja motum valatara taiyara kari rakhyum che
